channel.title: Could I actually get in trouble if
channel.description:
Could I get in trouble if I ran a site that buys and sells runescape gold?
I've been making a big profit off of buying and selling runescape gold for a while now and this summer I wanted to increase my sales by starting up a website. However, someone mentioned to me this is illegal in the United States and that is why it is so popular in China.
Could I actually get in trouble for having a site to make my "business" official?

item.title: Could I actually get in trouble if
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:17, topic:441566”][quote author=marcbob link=topic=544264.msg3989458#msg3989458 date=1336354256]

necessary copyright protection

Guess nobody really pays attention to my posts:(… Go on a goldselling site and check out there information regarding sales on it and so forth for a better insight into the matter.

So you’re saying I should copyright my site…?
Just because I put Copyright marcbob 2012 doesn’t mean that it is a real copyright and I doubt any gold selling sites have something close to that.
[/quote]
Nuuu, i didn’t mean it like that… but cba explaining so nvm[/quote]
Good talk.

Read full topic
item.source: Could I actually get in trouble if

item.title: Could I actually get in trouble if
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“n10si t, post:15, topic:441566”]China’s internet laws etc

i guess if you managed to get ahold of a server located in china you’d be fine[/quote]

Not a bad thought but they still may be able to check and see I own it.

item.title: Could I actually get in trouble if
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“t4, post:13, topic:441566”][quote author=marcbob link=topic=544264.msg3989433#msg3989433 date=1336353429]

most likely, selling jagex property is a little illegal…

Then why aren’t all the chinese sites punished? I’m not trying to sound sarcastic, I just don’t get how some people get away with it then.
[/quote]
it’s a little hard to extradite people from china…[/quote]

Agreed. Do you think they would actually try and fine me or something if I were only dealing with around 2b a month?

Read full topic

item.title: Could I actually get in trouble if
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:8, topic:441566”][quote author=marcbob link=topic=544264.msg3989433#msg3989433 date=1336353429]

most likely, selling jagex property is a little illegal…

Then why aren’t all the chinese sites punished? I’m not trying to sound sarcastic, I just don’t get how some people get away with it then.
[/quote]Because they’re Asian I guess.[/quote]
Kracky, I love you, but I am looking for the real reason.

I wouldn’t care if I ran the site and they just shut it down but if they actually wanted to fine me then I would never risk that.

Read full topic
